item.title: [TuT] COMPLETE webclient [317] by: microscape
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

If anyone gets an error when loading the client, and it says something like: Client Updated - Please Reload Client, or shows a black screen with yellow words, then check your imagery directory. A client with spirts/sprites cannot load if it cannot find it’s intended spirts/sprites, so this causes the client to automatically update until it does find them.

Read full topic
